Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1969...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1971, off Samuel Poitra (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1971, off Thomas Tuttle (PEN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 9/3/1972...
Drove in 8 runs against Lynchburg on 5/22/1975...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1977, hitting .414 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1977, hitting .357 with 9 HR, 34 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Ashburn on 5/9/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1979, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1979, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/9/1982 to a 4-year deal worth $1,725,000 per year...
